Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel with Finest Staff !!!”
Reviews.Author: MumbaiJay2009
Reviews.Content: spite hotel bur dubai finest location simply major shopping metro station gold souk walking distance absolutely clean toilets cleaned daily basis toiletries generously replenished shoe polishing machine floor breakfast indian simply awesome excellent stayed 7 days everyday item restaurant staff courteous speaking staff single staff hotel courteous polite ready time sincere thanks edward senior receptionist helpful giving guidance arranging tours short notice letting checkout time send local fax reply oh sir house mean wont hotels service wonderful experience ambassador exceeded expectations

Reviews.Title: “Great Location & Good Service”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 6 nights hotel locationits bus terminal metro terminal convenient walk steps department store carrefour nearby close heritage restos dubai diera souqs clean mark 3 star hotel service staff cordial helpful breakfast simple restaurant manager helpful accommodating hotel owned indian national expect indian dishes serve continental wifi freebut somehow couldnt connected facebook bar didnt judging looks pleasant experience

Reviews.Content: hotels dubai fades comparison liked bar dragon location bit awkward food specifically indian choices pick drop service average am saying dont thats true value personnaly royal ascot instead

Reviews.Content: hotel star hotel five star service hotel 5 nights 13th 18 december employee hotel cooperative helpful feel comfortable guide explore dubai arranged tour package hotel included half day city tour desert safari dinner dow cruise dinner hotel nice clean view khalifa shins star night khalifa flashing lights night 2 people bath tub fridge etc etc kept clean house keeping section time lunch tour cleaned nice feeling enter breakfast included free nice staff nice serve nice breakfast arrange special request breakfast restaurant days decorated christmas trees stuff coz christmas time hotel located bur dubai middle city easy access shopping mall taxi indian restaurant etc etc shopping mall named carrefour near hotel shopping prefered food restaurant name food joint meena bazaar close buy stuff theres bus stop near easily taxi entrance hotel boat near hotel diera gold souk boats charge 1 aed travel creek soo hotel location access travel soo hotels budget tour dubai

Reviews.Title: “Not to be missed hotel esp for a family with small kids”
Reviews.Author: M_Pune
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel ambassador 5 days family 3 including 18 months kids special arrangments related food mainly milk excellant service hotel staff stay cooperative indians especially speaking helped lot catering child food habits location hotel convenient centrally located strongly advice stay hotel vey essential amenities
